head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CHORY, WILLIAM J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CHORY, WILLIAM J.

block.p: CHORY-William J. On September 1, 2000. Resident of Pawling, NY, formerly of NYC. Father of James, Robert and Susan Chory and Cynthia Zavras. Grandfather of Jennifer, Ashley and Robert Chory and Zachary Zavras. Funeral arrangements are incomplete at this time. Contact Horn & Thomes Funeral Home, 914855-3550.
